00037 ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter::ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter()
00038 {
00039         pdata = NULL;
00040 }
00041 
00042 ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter::~ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter()
00043 {
00044         pdata = NULL;
00045 }

00047 static void PrepentTag(ParameterNameValueType &param, const wchar_t *tag)
00048 {
00049         if (param.GetName().find(tag) == -1)
00050                 param.SetName(tag + param.GetName());
00051 }
00052 
00053 void ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter::PrependAlgorithmParameterNameTag(ParameterNameValueType &param)
00054 {
00055         const wchar_t* tag = L"apt-";
00056         PrepentTag(param, tag);
00057 }
00058 
00059 void ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter::PrependAlgorithmParameterOptionNameTag(ParameterNameValueType &param)
00060 {
00061         const wchar_t* tag = L"apt-opt-";
00062         PrepentTag(param, tag);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter::AddCELHeader(const std::string &celFileName)
00066 {
00067         FusionCELData cel;
00068     cel.SetFileName(celFileName.c_str());
00069     if (!cel.ReadHeader())
00070                 Err::errAbort("Unable to read CEL file: " + celFileName);
00071         GenericData *gdata = cel.GetGenericData();
00072         if (gdata != NULL)
00073                 pdata->GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*gdata->Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00074         cel.Close();
00075 }
00076 
00077 void ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter::AddAlgorithmInformation
00078 (
00079         const wchar_t *algname,
00080         const wchar_t *algversion,
00081         const wchar_t *progname,
00082         const wchar_t *progversion,
00083         const wchar_t *progcompany
00084 )
00085 {
00086         pdata->SetAlgName(algname);
00087         pdata->SetAlgVersion(algversion);
00088         
00089         ParameterNameValueType param;
00090         const wchar_t *names[] = { L"program-name", L"program-version", L"program-company" };
00091         const wchar_t *values[] = { progname, progversion, progcompany };
00092         for (int i=0; i<sizeof(names) / sizeof(wchar_t*); i++)
00093         {
00094                 param.SetName(names[i]);
00095                 param.SetValueText(values[i]);
00096                 pdata->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00097         }
00098 }
00099 
00100 void ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter::AddArrayInfo(int nsets, int maxLen, const wchar_t *arrayType)
00101 {
00102         pdata->SetEntryCount(nsets, maxLen); 
00103         pdata->SetArrayType(arrayType);
00104 }
00105 
00106 void ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter::AddParameters(const ParameterNameValueTypeList &params, bool storeAsParams)
00107 {
00108         if (storeAsParams == true)
00109                 pdata->AddAlgParams(params);
00110         else
00111                 pdata->AddSummaryParams(params);
00112 }

00114 void ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter::WhiteExpressionSignalDetectionCHPFile
00115 (
00116         const std::string &celFileName,
00117         const std::string &chpFileName,
00118         const std::wstring &algname,
00119         const std::wstring &algversion,
00120         const std::wstring &progname,
00121         const std::wstring &progversion,
00122         const std::wstring &company,
00123         const std::wstring &arrayType,
00124         const ParameterNameValueTypeList &algParams,
00125         const ParameterNameValueTypeList &summaryParams,
00126         const std::list<std::string> &psnames,
00127         const std::list<float> &signals,
00128         const std::list<float> &pvalues
00129 )
00130 {
00131         int nsets = (int) psnames.size();
00132         int maxLen = 0;
00133         for (std::list<std::string>::const_iterator it=psnames.begin(); it!=psnames.end(); it++)
00134                 maxLen = max(maxLen, (int) it->length());
00135 
00136         CHPQuantificationDetectionData data(chpFileName);
00137         pdata = &data;
00138         AddCELHeader(celFileName);
00139         AddAlgorithmInformation(algname.c_str(), algversion.c_str(), progname.c_str(), progversion.c_str(), company.c_str());
00140         AddArrayInfo(nsets, maxLen, arrayType.c_str());
00141         AddParameters(algParams, true);
00142         AddParameters(summaryParams, true);
00143                                 
00144     ProbeSetQuantificationDetectionData entry;
00145     CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter writer(data);
00146     writer.SeekToDataSet();
00147         
00148         int idx=0;
00149         std::list<std::string>::const_iterator psit = psnames.begin();
00150         std::list<float>::const_iterator sigit = signals.begin();
00151         std::list<float>::const_iterator pvalit = pvalues.begin();
00152     while (psit != psnames.end())
00153         {
00154                 entry.id = idx++;
00155                 entry.name = *psit++;
00156         entry.quantification = *sigit++;
00157                 entry.pvalue = *pvalit++;
00158         writer.WriteEntry(entry);
00159     }
00160 }
